description: It will be up to the EU to decide who takes over the role, after Phil Hogan resigned last month.
title: EU trade commissioner nominations for Mairead McGuinness and Andrew McDowell
title_page: EU trade commissioner nominations for Mairead McGuinness and Andrew McDowell - BBC News
maintext: The Taoiseach @MichealMartinTD has informed me of the nomination of @MaireadMcGMEP and @AMcDowell as the Irish candidates for the post of commissioner. I will interview them early next week on their qualifications for the job.
